title: Nobody came to class.
content:
So nobody came to class. A slow day here in   
New Zald. What does the international community   
think of this?   
   
 ![pixel_script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414215717im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/10792.jpg)
author: kris

comments.content: let me know when it is finished. I would love a copy.
